reviewText:
The images and the story represented here are taken directly from my Master's Thesis when I was a graduate student at Humboldt State University.  Geoff deValois was married to me for six months.  I research, wrote, directed and yes, Geoff did help edit this work which was a PBS special in Eureka, California.  I recommending that Amazon take this offer down and notify Mr. deValois that I will be contacting my attorney Monday morning.

I have the original materials and will also notify the faculty and administration of Humboldt State University, who actually owns the copyright of this work that it has been stolen.
